title: Restore character count progress bar and remove extra border in chatroom chat input

requirements.text: Add a character count progress bar to the chat input in the chatroom page, matching the style and implementation used in the create room modal inputs (CharacterLimitProgress component with percentage-based width and color transitions)

quotes: readd the character count progress bar to the chat input in the chatroom page (it was removed)
the same progress bar used in the create a room modal inputs

acceptanceCriteria: Character count progress bar appears below the textarea in MessageInput component
Progress bar style matches the CharacterLimitProgress component used in CreateChatroomDialog
Progress bar shows visual feedback with color transitions based on character count percentage
Progress bar updates in real-time as user types

requirements.text: Remove the extra top border from the chat input area in the chatroom page without changing any other styles

quotes: remove extra border on the top of the chat input area
theres an extra border top in the chat input area

acceptanceCriteria: No visible border appears at the top of the chat input area
The fix applies specifically to the MessageInput component in the chatroom context

constraints: Do not change any styles except for the border removal and character count addition
Character count progress bar must match exactly the style used in CreateChatroomDialog
nonGoals: Adding new features beyond the character count restoration
